criteria: Analysis of Characteristics of Political Systems
Evaluation of the Development of Political Systems

descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of the origins of different political systems.
Shows a very limited understanding of the origins of political systems, with significant inaccuracies.
Displays a basic understanding of the origins of some political systems but lacks depth and detail.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of the origins of several political systems, with some supporting details.
Exhibits a strong understanding of the origins of various political systems, including specific examples and historical context.
Shows a comprehensive and nuanced understanding of the origins of diverse political systems, demonstrating insightful analysis and synthesis.
Unable to identify or analyze any characteristics of political systems.
Identifies only a few basic characteristics of political systems, with little to no analysis.
Analyzes some characteristics of political systems, but the analysis is superficial and lacks supporting evidence.
